hadiths.text: Wa'il bin Hujr narrated:"I saw Allah's Messenger when he prostrated placing his knees (on the ground) before his hands, and when he got up, he raised his hands before his knees

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وَضْعِ الرُّكْبَتَيْنِ قَبْلَ الْيَدَيْنِ فِي السُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Placing The Knees (On The Ground) Before The Hands For Prostration
